displayBio.en: Song Dong (born 1966, Beijing) graduated from the Fine Arts Department of Capital Normal University in 1989. A significant figure in the development of Chinese conceptual art in the 1990s, his practice incorporates performance, photography, video, and installation. Song lives and works in Beijing.
displayBio.zh-hant: 宋冬 (1966年生於北京，現工作及生活於北京) 於1989年首都師範大學美術系畢業，是對90年代中國概念藝術發展最具影響力的藝術家之一。宋冬的作品結合了表演、攝影、錄像及裝置等媒介。
